articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Jupiter’s moons hide giant subsurface oceans, missions to send spacecraft to see if moons support life - Deccan Herald
articles.description: By Mike Sori for The Conversation On April 13, 2023, the European Space Agency is scheduled to launch a rocket carrying a spacecraft destined for Jupiter. The Jupiter Icy Moons Explorer – or JUICE – will spend at least three years on Jupiter’s moons after it …
articles.content:
By Mike Sori for The Conversation
